replies.body: This is the worst thing from them to date.... and, lately, that is saying A LOT.
Yea also just unfair for a 1v1v1v1v1v5
That won't happen very often.
But what % of it happening is too much?

27 million people play this game every day. Lets say 1/3 of those people are playing ranked = 9 million players every day play ranked. 9 million / 10 = 900,000 games of ranked played every day. Lets say everyone plays 3 games of ranked everyday = 2.7 million games played everyday. Lets say the above scenario happens .01% of the time.  270 games of the 2.7 million total games is going to be a 1v1v1v1v1v5. 270 x 5 = 1350 players every day getting screwed over by this ranking system.

I agree people are blowing all this out of proportion, but those groups mentioned that will tank games just to piss you off do exist. They aren't everywhere, in fact I doubt some players will even get matched up with them. But it will happen, just like the occasions it does in normals, and the reason I try to avoid blind pick altogether (it's where most of them are) because it's the most frustrating experience to have to deal with 4 people who share a single purpose to ruin your day. Like going to a paintball shooting area or something, meeting a bunch of people who agree to be on your team in red vs. blue, and the second the match starts they turn on you and pelt you, then run off. And now they're in ranked...

Idk maybe the good will outweigh the harm. I'm just saying, even if the worst case scenario barely happens, if that scenario is the most unfun thing on the planet, it's a failed system.

Yes those four people will team up to fight the solo guy and blame him.
And if there already enough people solo or duo out there who waste 30 minutes and 20 lp to ruin the game for other's by trolling or afking just because they didn't get their lane or whatever why shouldn't 4 man premades behave like this?

Ok but at least those 4 guys can work together and increase your chances of winning... Id rather have 4 toxic people gang up on me but win than have 4 toxic people against me and each other and we lose...
